title: Resolution problem with the new client 6.15
body:
Help, I was just playing flex previously and I started another after the patch released ranked, queued up.. BAM couldn't see shit, see the video below, I even got reported for it, I legit just hope not to get banned rn :(

http://i.imgur.com/stmd4yZ.jpg

replies.body: With the new introduction of 7.1 a lot of people is having this issue , im having it too , se we have to find out if riot will post something to this frustrating piece of crap issue .

This is a[ recent issue ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001073767--Jan-11-Click-here-if-you-re-getting-an-Out-Of-Range-or-Input-Not-Supported-error-on-loading-screen-)we're currently investigated, but pressing Alt+Enter in-game can work as a temporary work around.  You can also try the following workaround if you feel comfortable making a manual modification:

Log in to League of Legends
Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

Let me know if that works for you!
Temp fix is that you can alt+enter during the game when the monitor is black and play in windowed mode, can't go fullscreen though, I tried...

i've the same Problem ;(
tried everything to fix'it...
